esema, biyagama polis bala pradeshaye padinchi minuwangoda brandiks sewakayin biyagama polisiya idiripitata saha kiribathgoda polis bala pradeshaye padinchikaruwanta kiribathgoda polisiya idiripitatath paminena lesa danum denawa.mita amatharawa sapugaskanda polis bala pradeshaye padinchi minuwangoda brandiks aayathanaye sewaya karana sewaka sewikawan sapugaskanda polisiya idiripitata saha paliyagoda polis bala pradeshaye padinchikaruwan dharmadasa kridanganayatath, kalaniye padinchikaruwan kalaniya polisiya idiripita ratha galatath, kadawatha padinchikaruwan kadawatha adhiwegi palama asala his idama wethatath paminena lesa danum denawa.esema, migahawaththa polis bala pradeshaye padinchi minuwangoda brandiks aayathanaye sewaka sewikawan udupila handiya gowijana sewa madhyasthanaya asalatath, ragama padinchikaruwan basilika kridanganayatath, mahabage padinchikaruwan waththala pradeshiya lekam karyalaya asalatath paminena lesayi polis mulasthanaya danum denne.minuwangoda brandiks aayathanaye sewaya karana ihatha pradeshawalata paribahirawa wenath pradeshawala padinchi ho nawathangena sitina aya langama pihiti polis sthanayata thama wisthara labadena lesada polis mulasthanaya wadiduratath niwedanaya kala.
